revised_title: Determination of the Moon's Moments of Inertia and Mechanical Ellipticity
tldr: The author presents a new method for determining the Moon's moments of inertia and mechanical ellipticity using heliometric observations. The method involves adjusting the observations using the least squares method and eliminates the effect of irradiation. The results show that the Moon's mechanical ellipticity is below the critical value, allowing for an accurate determination of the differences in its moments of inertia.
